settings.title: Settings
settings.moneyforpost: Money given for a new post
settings.moneyfordiscussion: Money given for a new discussion
settings.postminimumlength: Post minimum length to get the money (0 to disable)
settings.ignore_notifying_users: When checking the word count of replies, only focus on the content section
settings.noshowzero: Do not show if the value is zero
settings.cascaderemove: Remove money for posts when a discussion is deleted
settings.moneyforlike: Money given when a post is liked

autoremove: When a discussion/post is hidden or restored (default)
